subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Edgar Sosa scored 18 points, Jerry Smith added 12 and the Cardinals locked up the Golden Eagles again, winning, 71-57, Monday night to end No. 16 Marquette’s 14-game home winning streak.
snippet: Edgar Sosa scored 18 points, Jerry Smith added 12 and the Cardinals locked up the Golden Eagles again, winning, 71-57, Monday night to end No. 16 Marquette’s 14-game home winning streak.
